summary: Min, the owner of a dockside hotel, is forced to make difficult decisions about the future of Nancy, the young woman she took in as an infant.
cast: Marie Dressler|Wallace Beery|Dorothy Jordan|Marjorie Rambeau|Don Dillaway|DeWitt Jennings|Russell Hopton|Frank McGlynn Sr.|Gretta Gould|Hank Bell|Jack Pennick|Henry Roquemore
director: Director: George W. Hill (as George Hill)
title: Fruta amarga
